snippet: Virgin Galactic said it would develop a new rocket that would carry small satellites into orbit at a fraction of the current cost.
abstract: Virgin Galactic, space venture founded by Richard Branson, says it plans to develop a rocket that would carry small satellites into orbit at a fraction of the current cost.
lead_paragraph: Virgin Galactic said it would develop a new rocket that would carry small satellites into orbit at a fraction of the current cost.

headline.seo: Branson Company to Enter Satellite-Launching Business
headline.main: Branson Offers a Service to Launch Small Satellites
headline.print_headline: Branson Offers a Service To Launch Small Satellites
